name: CycleBusinessPurpose
title: Cycle Business Purpose
description: Cycle Business Purpose codes for insurance operations.

concept.display: Code used to enable the identification of billing information or billing notices.   Some instances where this code might be used include (but are not restricted to):  Billing Notice; Overdue Payment Notice; Refund Notice; Withdrawal/Reject Notice; Final Bill Notice; Return/Reject.
concept.definition: Code used to enable the identification of billing information or billing notices.   Some instances where this code might be used include (but are not restricted to):  Billing Notice; Overdue Payment Notice; Refund Notice; Withdrawal/Reject Notice; Final Bill Notice; Return/Reject. — cycle business purpose code.

designation.value: Code utilisé pour permettre l'identification des informations de facturation ou d'avis de facturation. Quelques instances où ce code pourrait être utilisé inclue (sans y être restreint): Avis de facturation; Avis de paiement en retard; Avis de remboursement; Avis de retrait/rejet; Avis de facture finale; Retour/Rejet
